<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Mantis Scion](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=83)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 70 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** High Seas

</column>

At least one of your parents is a member of the notorious Red Mantis assassins, merciless killers for hire who rarely fail to claim their marks. Whether on purpose or by simple exposure, you were trained from a young age in the art of stalking and killing people.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) skill, and the [Assassin Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) skill feat with [Stealth.](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)
name: Mantis Scion
